[windows] stop # FIXME AFAICT go-git does not support file:// URLs on windows

mkhomedir golden
chmod 755 golden/git
mkhomedir

# install fake git
cp golden/git bin

! chezmoi init
chezmoi init --use-builtin-git=true
exists $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/.git

[short] stop

# create a commit
rm bin/git # disable fake git
[!exec:git] stop
cp golden/.bashrc $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/dot_bashrc
chezmoi git add dot_bashrc
chezmoi git commit -- --message 'Add dot_bashrc'
cp golden/git bin # restore fake git

# test chezmoi init --use-builtin-git=true
chhome home2/user
chezmoi init --use-builtin-git=true file://$WORKSLASH/home/user/.local/share/chezmoi
exists $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/.git
cmp $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/dot_bashrc golden/.bashrc

# create a second commit
chhome home/user
rm bin/git # disable fake git
cp golden/.binary $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/executable_dot_binary
chezmoi git add executable_dot_binary
chezmoi git commit -- --message 'Add executable_dot_binary'
cp golden/git bin # restore fake git

# test chezmoi update --use-builtin-git=true
chhome home2/user
! chezmoi update
chezmoi update --use-builtin-git=true
cmp $CHEZMOISOURCEDIR/executable_dot_binary golden/.binary

-- golden/git --
#!/bin/sh

exit 1
